LanguageData.ARA_PowerArmor_NoFuel.label: Symbiotic muscle group malnutrition
LanguageData.ARA_PowerArmor_NoFuel.description: This symbiotic muscle group is malnourished due to a lack of nutrients, which has negative effects on the host.
LanguageData.ARA_SpiderOne_PowerArmor_MainHediff.desc: This is a special biological structure of the Arachne insects. Although they have the main organs of a living organism, they lack intelligence, and by merging with the nervous system of the insects, they become equipped like a power armor. The symbiotic muscles provide the host with additional heavy weapons, and the body surface is equipped with numerous micro-armed organs, allowing the Arachne insects to handle forces comparable to human tanks.
